# Signing Transactions

Sign the pending transaction \(the byte array obtained by the inverse hexadecimal encoding of the transaction\_blob\) with the ED25519 algorithm and the private key, and perform hexadecimal conversion to get sign\_data, the signature string.

The following example shows how to sign the transaction\_blob with ED25519 and the private key.

The private key:

_b00115764cd017e0da753271fa26cd529451a21b8253d001f0d43612e19ec632570a74ab166b_

The transaction\_blob:

__

After signing the transaction\_blob with the signature interface of ED25519 and performing hexadecimal conversion, the resulting sign\_data is:

_a46ee590a84abdeb8cc38ade1ae8e8a2c71bb69bdc4cd7dc0de1b74b37e2cbd1696229687f80dff4276b1a3dd3f95a9bc1d569943b337fe170317430f36d6401_
